Service Details: Offers a community-based sport funding program providing grants for children ages 18 and under in Kelowna to participate in a sport season of their choice
Eligibility: Ages: 18 year(s) and underPlease visit our website for the complete details on funding eligibility
How to Apply: Each Calendar year, only one application for one eligible sport, may be submitted *  applications must be received prior to at the beginning the requested season of sportApplication forms may be obtained at: http://www.kidsportcanada.ca/british-columbia/kelowna/apply-for-assistance/
Address & Map: 645 Dodd RdKelowna, BC     V1X 5H1View MapQuest Map
